name: dart-data-class-generator
description: Create dart data classes easily, fast and without writing boilerplate.

commands.title: Dart Data Class Generator: Generate from class properties
Dart Data Class Generator: Generate from JSON

dart_data_class_generator.generate.const.description: Whether to generate a constructor for a data class.

dart_data_class_generator.generate.copyW.description: Whether to generate the copyWidth function for a data class.

dart_data_class_generator.generate.toMap.description: Whether to generate the toMap function for a data class.

dart_data_class_generator.generate.fromM.description: Whether to generate the fromMap function for a data class.

dart_data_class_generator.generate.toJso.description: Whether to generate the toJson function for a data class.

dart_data_class_generator.generate.fromJ.description: Whether to generate the fromJson function for a data class.

dart_data_class_generator.generate.toStr.description: Whether to generate the toString function for a data class.

dart_data_class_generator.generate.equal.description: Whether to generate a value equality function for a data class.

dart_data_class_generator.generate.hashC.description: Whether to generate the hashCode function for a data class.
